text.div:
Meningococcal Disease (Tests for Neisseria meningitidis Nucleic Acid in Specimen from Normally Sterile Site)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    53606-0 Neisseria meningitidis DNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
    6509-4 Neisseria meningitidis rRNA [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Probe
    82185-0 Neisseria meningitidis DNA [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with non-probe detection

name: Meningococcal Disease (Tests for Neisseria meningitidis Nucleic Acid in Specimen from Normally Sterile Site)
